DOC.brief_summary: The propose study seek establish feasibility universal screen depression adult primary care safety net setting , measure effectiveness culturally appropriate depression education intervention reduce stigma increase uptake depression treatment among Hispanics , implement Measurement-Based Integrated Care ( MBIC ) model collaborative , multi-disciplinary treatment culturally tailor care management strategy .
DOC.brief_title: METRIC : Measurement , Education Tracking Integrated Care
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aim 1 : Examine specific effect Depression Education Fotonovela ( DEF ) increase knowledge depression , reduce stigma increase engagement depression treatment among Hispanic patient . Specific Aim 2 : Evaluate impact Measurement-Based Integrated Care ( MBIC ) treatment depression one community-based Federally Qualified Health Centers ( FQHC ) North Texas whose patient population majority Hispanic . Specific Aim 3 : Examine feasibility universal screen accurate detection depression among adult primary care patient utilize innovative iPad Depression Screening technology .
DOC.criteria: Adult primary care patient Hispanic Meets diagnostic criterion depression currently treatment depression
